title: Customer Data Protection and GDPR Compliance Policy

changeLog.description: Added requirements for AI data processing transparency and retention limits.

content:
This policy establishes mandatory requirements for the protection of personal data processed by NordSure Insurance in accordance with applicable data protection legislation, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

Personal data must be processed lawfully, fairly, and transparently. Data collection shall be limited to what is necessary for defined insurance purposes such as underwriting, claims handling, and regulatory reporting.

Customers must be informed of how their data is used, stored, and shared. Privacy notices must be written in clear and accessible language. Consent, where required, must be explicit and documented.

Personal data shall not be retained longer than necessary. Retention periods are defined by business function and legal obligations. Upon expiration of retention periods, data must be securely deleted or anonymized.

Access to personal data must be restricted based on job role and business necessity. All access events must be logged and reviewed periodically. Data breaches must be reported to the Data Protection Officer within 24 hours of detection.

Use of AI systems involving personal data requires additional safeguards, including explainability, bias assessment, and human oversight. Non-compliance may result in regulatory penalties and disciplinary action.
